promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, short, single-word name for a chibi cute strong eagle electric-type pokemon wearing golden gemstones. It can be found in mountain-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, electric or eagle. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Gleambeak, a a chibi cute strong eagle electric-type pokemon. It can be found in mountain-like environments It has the following abilities: Electric Bolt, Crazy Spore. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "eagle", "electric" or "Gleambeak". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of electric-type pokemon, eagle-like, strong, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, lightning background
generatedDescription: This petite, powerful avian soars through the mountains, charging itself with sparks. Using Electric Bolt and Crazy Spore, Gleambeak lights up the skies.
